title: Uruguay
summary: Founded in 1915, Citi Uruguay offers corporate and institutional clients a wide array of financial services and products. The award-winning local franchise offers investment banking services that focus on lending and capital markets, treasury and trade services; and other financial solutions tailored to client's needs.
tag-2: For more than 100 years, Citi has enabled economic growth in Uruguay.
tag-3: Founded in 1915, Citi Uruguay offers corporate and institutional clients a wide array of financial services and products.
